name: hackernews-js
description: Tiny, fast Hacker News API wrapper with batching, hydration, and updates.
author: William Owusu <williamowusu1998@gmail.com>

scripts.build: tsc && esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --format=esm --outfile=dist/index.js && esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --format=cjs --outfile=dist/index.cjs && esbuild src/lru.ts --bundle --format=esm --outfile=dist/lru.js && esbuild src/lru.ts --bundle --format=cjs --outfile=dist/lru.cjs && esbuild src/utils.ts --bundle --format=esm --outfile=dist/utils.js && esbuild src/utils.ts --bundle --format=cjs --outfile=dist/utils.cjs
